name: Twistbot
description:
You play as a little droid trying to escape a tower.

Controls

Arrow keys - Move
Z - Click buttons
X - Shift perspective

Attribution 

Background music: Ambient electronic loop 001 by frankum licensed under CC BY 3.0

Sound effects created using as3sfxr

The font was created by Jerom at OpenGameArt.org:
https://opengameart.org/content/small-blocky-font

The game is using three.js
